Alchemist x Credmark Design Competition

Momin Ahmad I 09.01.2021

Now that Credmark Wizard Island spells are crafted, our Credmark team is excited to also launch a Collaborative Design Competition!

Show us your best Credmark & Alchemist artwork — with Credmark as the main component — for a chance to win one of 4 reward Crucibles!

Artwork can be videos, gifs, memes, banners, images and more. Get creative, keep it fun and clean — most importantly show off your skills!

Four worthy entries will be chosen to receive Crucibles loaded with tokens already subscribed to the Wizard Island — this allows the winners to participate instantly in the Credmark Crucible Rewards program

Artwork Promo Details

START DATE: 2 September 20:00 UTC



END DATE: 5 September 23:59 UTC

Rewards

(all rewards will be contained in a Crucible that is already minted, and will be airdropped to winners via their ETH address)

1st Place receives an Alchemist Crucible, containing:

  • 1000 CMK & equivalent ETH SLP subscribed to Wizard Island

3 runners up receive an Alchemist Crucible, containing:

  • 500 CMK & equivalent ETH SLP subscribed to Wizard Island

**All participants will receive a POAP!!!

Rules:

  • Join the Credmark Discord and follow the guide in “#start-here” channel to get the “Apprentice” Role.
  • RSVP to the event in the “#events” channel so you get a reminder of when it begins! It’s not required, but helps us keep track of whose participating!
  • ONLY 1 submission per person allowed
  • Use Credmark & Alchemist official logos (click for Drive Folder for Credmark Assets and Figma link for Alchemist Assets)
  • Submit your entry to Credmark’s Discord in the “#mist-cmk-comp” channel. THIS CHANNEL WILL BE OPEN TO SUBMISSIONS STARTING AT 15:00 UTC ON SEPTEMBER 2.
  • By submitting your entry you are allowing Credmark & Alchemist to use your design on social channels.

Just drop your submission in the channel, tag an admin and say “Here is my submission for the contest” it’s that easy!

If you have any issue, tag an @admin in our #feedback channel for help.

Submissions will be open for viewing in a dedicated Discord channel in the Credmark Discord.
